Entering oder exiting a Portal requires a full move, meaning that a formation using a double action can exit the battlefield in the first move und use it's second move to enter play again using another Portal, but a formation can not use an advance oder engage action to enter eine und exit another Portal as part of the same move. Any units that are out of coherency at the end of any move is destroyed. A formation picked up by a Portal must remain in the Reserven until they can activate to re-enter play. A formation can activate to enter play on the same turn it was picked up, given that the formation had not already activated before it was picked up.

Jeweils time a formation uses a Portal on a unit that is broken, it receives eine Beschussmarke. This also goes für broken Verbände using a broken portal, meaning that eine unit will be lost unless all units are Furchtlos.

If a Portal is in an enemy zone of control, any formation that enters through it must Engage the blocking formation. In addition, if it is also directly under an enemy unit, the portal can still be used to enter the battlefield but the formation that enters must maximize base contact as much as possible with the blocking units.

rules.title: Unaufhaltsamer Vormarsch
description: Necron Verbände receive a +1 bonus when attempting to perform a Marshal action, but suffer a -1 penalty when attempting to perform a March action.

rules.title: Ponderous
description: Einheiten mit the Ponderous Sonderregel may only make a single withdrawal move instead of zwei when becoming broken oder failing to rally.

rules.title: Phase Out
description: At the end of any action by any formation, if a broken Necron formation has lost half oder more of its starting number of units, it Phases Out. This means that it is removed from the battlefield, und counts as destroyed für victory condition purposes.

rules.title: Enduring
description: Necron Verbände containing Einheiten mit Enduring don’t Phase Out. If the formation has lost all Einheiten mit Enduring it Phase Out as normal.

rules.title: Big Mek
description: Every Gargant Big Mob army must include a Supreme Command character called a Big Mek, which is free. The Big Mek will join most expensive war engine in the army.

rules.title: Mega Transportpanzas und Mega Wummenpanzas
description: Mega Transportpanzas und Mega Wummenpanzas may only transport units from their own formation (i.e., the rules für Kriegsmaschine transports do not apply to them when using the tournament army lists).

rules.title: Schpezialkraftfelder
description: Some Ork war engines are protected by banks of Schpezialkraftfelder. The number jeweils war engine has is noted on its datasheet. Schpezialkraftfelder work in exactly the same manner as Deflektorschilde (see Deflektorschilde), with the sole exception that they may not be repaired once they have been knocked down by a hit, und will instead remain down für the remainder of the battle. In the case of a variable amount of Schpezialkraftfelder, roll für them straight after the formation is deployed on the table oder offboard.

rules.title: Vollkommen Entbehrlich
description: A formation does not receive a Beschussmarke when a unit with Vollkommen Entbehrlich is destroyed, this includes the extra Beschussmarke from the first casualty of a crossfire und für units destroyed für being out of formation after a move. If a Vollkommen Entbehrlich unit is hit by a weapon with Disrupt it does not inflict a Beschussmarke.
Vollkommen Entbehrlich units killed in an assault do not count when working out the result.
Verbände comprised completely of Entbehrlich und/oder Vollkommen Entbehrlich units do not benefit from any of the rules above.

rules.title: Snakebite Clan Warlords
description: Every Snakebite Clan army must include a Supreme Command character called a Warlord. The Warlord character is free, you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. The Warlord must be attached to a unit of Brutes in the scrappiest formation in the army (i.e. the formation with the most units that also contains a unit of Brutes. Kriegsmaschinen counts as eine unit pro DC).

rules.title: Push 'Em Harder Ladz
description: Whenever any type of Gargant passes an Action Test that allows movement, the Spieler may opt to change the unit's speed rating to 20cm für the entire duration of the chosen Action, however if this ability is used the model will receive a Critical Hit für with jeweils move that is carried out.

rules.title: Köppe zählen
description: Orks believe that as long as there’s a bunch of them still fighting together (slightly more than they can count bis zu is ideal!) then there’s always a chance that they’ll prevail, no matter the odds. To represent this, Ork Verbände mit more than fünf units (i.e., too many to count on the fingers of eine hand), not including Grotz oder Big Gunz units, receive a +1 modifier to any rally rolls they make, und Verbände mit more than 10 such units receive a +2 modifier. Für the purposes of this rule Kriegsmaschinen count jeweils point of starting damage capacity as a unit. Kriegsmaschinen with the 'Gottgleiche Maschine' Sonderregel always counts as being more than 10 units.

rules.title: Jetz' geht's los
description: Einheiten mit the Jetz' geht's los special rule gain einen zusätzlichen 5cm Speed when their formation performs an Engage Action.

rules.title: Rush ‘em Ladz
description: Verbände that contain eine oder more Einheiten mit the Rush ‘em Ladz Sonderregel receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test roll when attempting to carry out a March action.

rules.title: Macht des Waagh
description: Orks are not noted für their organisational abilities, und thus usually have a pretty low Initiative. However, if there is eine thing that will galvanise an Ork warband, it’s the thought of a good punch-up! Because of this, Ork Verbände that are attempting to take engage oder double actions receive a +2 modifier to their Action Test roll. Ork Flyboyz similarly relish the chance to shoot things up, und receive a +2 modifier to their Action Test roll when attempting to carry out Interception oder Ground Attack actions (see Aircraft).

rules.title: Clan Goffs Warlord
description: Every Warhorde army must include a Oberbefehlshaber character called a Warlord. The Warlord character is free, you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. If the army includes any Great Gargants, then the Warlord must be placed in eine of them. Otherwise the Warlord will join a Gargant oder Bosse unit.

rules.title: Heizakult Warlord
description: Every Speed Freaks army must include a Oberbefehlshaber called a Mekboy Bad Ork Biker. The Mekboy Bad Ork Biker unit is free; you don’t have to pay any Punkte für it. The Mekboy Bad Ork Biker unit may be added to any Ork formation in the army.

rules.title: Heizakult
description: Every unit in a Evil Sunz Heizakult army must either have a speed of 30cm plus, oder be transported in a unit mit einemspeed of 30cm plus. In other words, Verbände may not include units mit einemspeed of less than 30cm unless they also have a transport vehicle capable of carrying the unit around.

rules.title: Koordinierter Beschuss
description: A formation that contains at least eine unit with Koordinierter Beschuss can order bis zu zwei other un-broken Verbände innerhalb von 15cm that have not taken an action this turn to follow their own formation when they take an Advance, Double oder Sustained Fire action.

Make a single Initiative roll für all foarmations, counting a single -1 modifier if any have Beschussmarke. If the test is failed then the original formation (containing the unit calling für Koordinierter Beschuss) receives a Beschussmarke und must take a hold action. The other Verbände are unaffected (und may take an action later in the turn). If the test is passed then all Verbände concerned are allowed to take either an Advance, Double oder Sustained Fire action.

There is no obligation für all Verbände to take the same action, und these actions may be resolved in any order, but they must all fire at the same target formation. If the formation being activated is unable oder unwilling to fire at the selected formation, it cannot fire at all that turn. The Verbände don’t have to stay within a given distance of jeweils other und will complete their actions eine after the other. Jeweils Verbände action is declared und resolved (including testing to see if the target formation breaks) before moving on to the next Tau formation.

rules.title: Energiefeld
description: Tau Energiefelder work like an Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf in all respects, except it is 5+ instead of 6+. Against Titan Killer attacks, WE und H-AV must make eine Unmodifizierter Rettungswurf against jeweils point of damage.

rules.title: Guided Raketen
description: Guided Raketen may be fired without Line of Sight, but may only be fired at a targets that are Marked with Markerlights.

Guided Raketen follow all the normal suppression rules. If a unit mit einemGuided Rakete weapon is within range und Line of Sight to a unit in the target formation then it is counted für suppression purposes, even if the target formation is not Marked.
Guided Raketen counts as having Line of Sight to all units in a Marked formation für the purpose of suppression, Crossfire und when shooting as part of an Overwatch action.

rules.title: Markerlights
description: All enemy Verbände mit at least eine unit within 30cm range und Line of Sight of at least eine Tau unit with the Markerlights Sonderregel is considered to be Marked. When shooting at a Marked formation, all ranged Feuerkraft attacks gain einen zusätzlichen +1 modifier to their To-Hit roll. This bonus für shooting at a Marked enemy may not be used when making Anti-Aircraft attacks, oder with BP type attacks. A Tau formation that is broken oder has Marched this turn may not mark enemy Verbände.

rules.title: Tau Jet Packs
description: Tau Jet Packs follow all the rules für Sprungmodule. In addition, Verbände that exclusively consists of Einheiten mit Tau Jet Packs are allowed to make an extra move of bis zu 10cm at the end of an Advance, Double oder March action. The extra move is allowed whether oder not the unit fires und takes place after any firing. This extra move may be in any direction und follows all the normal movement rules, so unit coherency und zones of control must be adhered to as usual.

rules.title: Tiger Shark Gun Drones
description: Transported Gun Drone Verbände may be split across multiple Tiger Sharks as an exception to the normal aircraft transport rules. The Tiger Sharks cannot land, Engage, oder embark units, but can disembark transported Gun Drones after an approach move. The Gun Drone formation may shoot when it disembarks as normal (see Transporting Ground Units), und counts as having activated für that turn. After this initial deployment the Gun Drones are a completely Unabhängig formation.

rules.title: Synapse
description: The following rules applies to Primary und Secondary Synapse Swarm Verbände only. Synapse creatures are any unit with the 'Synapse' Sonderregel. A Synapse Swarm with no remaining Synapse creatures has an Initiative Rating of 3+ und may neither capture nor contest objectives, including They Shall Not Pass.

A Synapse Swarm with remaining Synapse creatures can absorb other Synapse Swarm Verbände mit no remaining Synapse creatures at the end of its action. The formation must have eine unit within 5cm of a unit from the formation(s) being absorbed. The units und Beschussmarke of an absorbed formation become part of the formation (broken Verbände are considered to have an equal number of Beschussmarke as the number of remaining units/starting DC). An absorbed formation is considered completely destroyed für the purposes of tie-break und the Brecht ihren Willen objective.

rules.title: Schwarmbewusstsein Locus
description: As long as the Tyranid army contains a unit with Schwarmbewusstsein Locus it may re-roll a single failed Initiative test (of any type) once pro turn (unless all Einheiten mit Schwarmbewusstsein Locus are located offboard).

rules.title: Broodmind
description: All Symbiontenkult Verbände containing an Iconward, Magus, Primus, Patriarch, oder Broodlord receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage action, und gain a +1 modifier when attempting to Rally.

rules.title: Symbiontenkult Charaktermodelle
description: Symbiontenkult Charaktermodelle dürfen nur den folgenden Einheiten hinzugefügt werden: INF that were not added to the formation as part of an upgrade.

rules.title: Schwarmbewusstsein
description: All Tyranid Verbände receive a +1 modifier to their Action Test when carrying out an Engage action, und a +1 modifier to their Rally Tests.

rules.title: Knallt die Großen ab!
description: The enemies of the Tyranids have learned that destroying the Schwarmbewusstsein's Synapse Creatures will cause Tyranid swarms to become disorganized. Für this reason certain units which normally would be Infanterie are instead Light Vehicles.

rules.title: Extreme Mobility
description: Tyranid AV und WE units do not take dangerous oder terrain tests. Tyranid LV units move through terrain und receive cover as if they were INF, und Tyranid INF does not need to take difficult terrain tests. Befestigte Stellungen such as Minenfelder, Stacheldraht, und special terrain features affect Tyranids normally.

rules.title: Extreme Mobility (Symbiontenkult)
description: Acolyte Hybrids, Aberrants, Symbionten, und Metamorph Hybrids does not need to take terrain tests. Befestigte Stellungen such as Minenfelder, Stacheldraht, und special terrain features affect these units normally.

rules.title: Ganten
description: Half (rounding up) of Termaganten, Hormaganten, Gargoyles, und Venatoren that are killed in an assault do not count für combat resolution und are Entbehrlich as long as there is at least eine model with Synapse still present in the formation.

rules.title: Dagon Vanguard Organisms
description: Only Symbionten, Liktoren, und Nest Swarms may deploy as Garnison.

rules.title: Hydra Vanguard Organisms
description: Only Symbionten, Liktoren, und Dimachaeron may deploy as Garnison.

rules.title: Schwarm (x)
description: In the End Phase, before Verbände have rallied, all unbroken Tyranid Verbände mit both Schwarm (x) und Synapse creatures may 'Swarm'.

Für jeweils Swarm point, eine unit with the 'Gaunts' rule that has been lost during the battle may be added to the formation, but jeweils unit with 'Schwarm (x)' may only bring back the types of units that are within brackets next to its 'Gantenbeutel'.

All units returned to play in this manner must be placed within 5cm of a unit from the formation that was there prior to Swarming, und may not be placed in enemy zones of control oder impassable terrain. Not all generated Swarm Punkte need to be used, but may not be saved für future turns.

rules.title: General Tournament Tiebreaker Rules
description: If a Spieler gives up the game, oder does not show up within 30 minutes it is scored as a Total Victory für the opponent. If a game must be abandoned before turn 4 because of lack of time, the current objective total determines the score, mit einem-4 penalty für both sides if the game ended prematurely in turn 2, und a -2 penalty für both sides if the game ended prematurely in turn 3. If eine Spieler was late to the game start by more than 5 minutes, that Spieler takes both Spieler’s penalties.

rules.title: Brood Brothers
description: As long as a formation contains eine Symbionten Patriarch, Symbionten Primus, Symbionten Magus, oder Hybrid Iconward, units in in the same formation with the 'Brood Brothers' Sonderregel do not cause Beschussmarke when they are destroyed, oder when hit by a weapon with the 'Disrupt' Sonderregel. This includes the extra Beschussmarke from the first casualty of a crossfire und für units destroyed für being out of formation after a move. Einheiten mit 'Brood Brothers' that are killed in an assault count für the purposes of working out its result.

rules.title: Broodcoven
description: The army must include a Broodcoven formation. Der Gegner erfüllt die “Brecht ihren Willen” Siegbedingung indem er diesen Verband oder den teuersten Verband zerstört (siehe Siegbedingungen).

rules.title: Thousand Sons Charaktermodelle
description: Thousand Sons Charaktermodelle dürfen nur den folgenden Einheiten hinzugefügt werden: Chaos Space Marines, Rubric Marines, Scarab Occult Terminatoren, oder Hexer Disc Riders.

rules.title: Overlord Insertion
description: Some Primaris Space Marines are equipped with heavy Sprungmodule oder Gravschirme designed to be dropped from low orbit onto the battlefield from the assault bays of low-orbiting attack crafts. This ability is represented by the formation gaining the Planetare Selbstlandung Sonderregel, with eine exception: Roll to scatter only für the first unit in the formation, then place the rest of the Einheiten innerhalb von 5cm of the first unit.
